title: looking for a duo partner
body:
Hi wewty here, 

Lets start off with I'm a bronze 2 player (man I was bad when I started) who carrys nearly every game, most of the time I win, the others are just poor team mates doing poor things, afks, mostly on promos aswell, you know the deal. In rank games I get matched with silvers most the time and normals gold and plats ( been matched with diamonds ( won lane kat D2 vs fizz they got so much flame cause I was bronze LOL) a few times and even a challenger the other day ) wich makes me think I have a good MMR,I have fairly high stats with my main champions all 50%+, my two mains are amumu jg with a 77% winrate 23/7 8.0kil 6.1 death 12.7 assist and leblanc mid 61% 25/ 16 12.7 kill 4.7 deaths 7.0 assist, 

I'm looking for a duo partner around the same stats who's main 6 are all 50%+ I can play any role but I'm not very good at top lane, check my lolking or what ever u use.

If intressted pm me ingame.

Thanks, wewty

replies.body: yo add me im looking for a partner also
